Indonesia, Aru Islands, Waigua (=Waigeoe). Collected by A.H. Bernstein, 1864. Publ.: De Man, 1881: 111 "A male specimen from the island of Waigeoei." The smaller specimen in this jar probably comes out of RMNH D 2686 which misses one specimen.
